content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #87496 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?

IIUC, this is not a regression but is still a bug. It seems like this is the behavior:

stable and beta: emits error
nightly: should compile successfully, but actually ICEs
Perhaps P-low as it's a linting error (with a patch waiting for review)
This sounds more like P-medium to me: error on stable -> ICE on nightly that should be success or lint warning.
